Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.11601906]Frog Virus 3:inhibition of FV3 infection in fathead minnow(FHM) cells(90% inhibition at 500 µM);Channel Catfish virus(CCV):inhibition of CCV infection in catfish ovary(CCO) cells( 90% inhibition at 50 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.C-terminal Modification: Cyclization of a C-terminal Cys residue (forming a disulfide bond)
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Inactivation of frog virus 3 and channel catfish virus by esculentin-2P and ranatuerin-2P, two antimicrobial peptides isolated from frog skin.
Literature.Author: Chinchar VG, Wang J, Murti G, Carey C, Rollins-Smith L.
